com.mindfusion.scheduling

Class TimelineSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.TimelineSettings

  • public final class TimelineSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates settings for a timeline in a Resource view.

    • Method Summary

      • getSize

        public java.lang.Integer getSize()
        Description copied from class: TimelineSettings
        Gets the size of the timeline.

        A value of 0 causes the size to be calculated automatically based on the size of the header font.

        Returns:
        A non-negative integer value.

      • getSpanTexts

        public java.lang.Boolean getSpanTexts()
        Description copied from class: TimelineSettings
        Gets a value indicating whether some cell texts will span more than one cell when the space in their corresponding cells is insufficient due to scaling the view.

        The number of spanned cells is specified by the SpanCellCount property. If the value of this property is 0, then the number of cells is automatically calculated based on the current scale factor, which is specified by the TimelineScale property.

        Returns:
        A Boolean value.

      • setSpanTexts

        public void setSpanTexts(java.lang.Boolean value)
        Description copied from class: TimelineSettings
        Sets a value indicating whether some cell texts will span more than one cell when the space in their corresponding cells is insufficient due to scaling the view.

        The number of spanned cells is specified by the SpanCellCount property. If the value of this property is 0, then the number of cells is automatically calculated based on the current scale factor, which is specified by the TimelineScale property.

        Parameters:
        value - A Boolean value. Set to null to use the corresponding value from the current theme.

      • getSpanCellCount

        public java.lang.Integer getSpanCellCount()
        Description copied from class: TimelineSettings
        Gets a value indicating the number of cells to span when SpanTexts is enabled.

        If this value is 0, it is automatically calculated based on the current scale factor, which is specified by TimelineScale.

        Returns:
        A non-negative integer value specifying the number of cells to span.

      • setSpanCellCount

        public void setSpanCellCount(java.lang.Integer value)
        Description copied from class: TimelineSettings
        Sets a value indicating the number of cells to span when SpanTexts is enabled.

        If this value is 0, it is automatically calculated based on the current scale factor, which is specified by TimelineScale.

        Parameters:
        value - A non-negative integer value specifying the number of cells to span. Set to null to use the corresponding value from the current theme.

      • getShowCurrentTime

        public java.lang.Boolean getShowCurrentTime()
        Description copied from class: TimelineSettings
        Gets a value indicating whether to indicate the current time in the timeline.
        Returns:
        true to indicate the current time; otherwise, false.

      • setShowCurrentTime

        public void setShowCurrentTime(java.lang.Boolean value)
        Description copied from class: TimelineSettings
        Sets a value indicating whether to indicate the current time in the timeline.
        Parameters:
